segments.text: I believe you ordered the Grand Slam breakfast .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , good ! You know , I am looking at my plate and I ordered scrambled eggs , not fried .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I just noticed that I accidentally brought you your friend's breakfast .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can just trade with him , thank you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sorry , but I think I ordered waffles .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sorry that I misheard you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just please take my pancakes to trade for waffles . While I am waiting , I will eat my bacon and eggs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will get straight back to you with your waffles .
segments.speaker: S1
